controller

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControllerInterface

    public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements ControllerInterface
    Basic controller class for games.
    Author:
    Stanislav Smatana, Dominika Fabcinova

        public Game(Player white,
    Player black)
        Constructor creates game with given players. Model and view are created implicitly. GUIView is used as view.
        Parameters:
        white - Player derived object for white player.
        black - Player derived object for black player.

      • Game

        public Game(java.lang.String xml_str,
    Player white,
    Player black)
     throws IllegalTurnException,
            DocumentException,
            CompletedGameLoadException
        Method creates game from xml description.
        Parameters:
        xml_str - Xml string in format ...
        white - White player.
        black - Black player.
        Throws:
        IllegalTurnException - If string contains illegal turn.
        DocumentException - If string is not in valid format.
        CompletedGameLoadException - If game in string is finished game. It can't be played.

      • Game

        public Game(java.io.File file,
    Player white,
    Player black)
     throws java.io.IOException,
            IllegalTurnException,
            DocumentException,
            CompletedGameLoadException
        Method creates game from xml description.
        Parameters:
        file - Xml file path.
        white - White player.
        black - Black player.
        Throws:
        IllegalTurnException - If file contains illegal turn.
        DocumentException - If file is not in valid format.
        CompletedGameLoadException - If game saved in file is finished game. It can't be played.
        java.io.IOException
